issue.title: MkUser.java:56-57: Implement notifications(),...

repository.name: jcabi-github
repository.description: Java Object-Oriented Wrapper of GitHub API, with a fake implementation of the entire GitHub API (for your tests)

issue.body:
The puzzle `913-743027ac` in [`src/main/java/com/jcabi/github/mock/MkUser.java`](https://github.com/jcabi/jcabi-github/blob/master/src/main/java/com/jcabi/github/mock/MkUser.java) (lines 56-57) has to be resolved: Implement notifications(), markAsRead(final Date lastread) operations in MkUser. Don't forget about unit tests.

The puzzle was created by Dmitri Pisarenko on 22-Jan-15. 

Estimate: 30 minutes, role: IMP.

If you have any technical questions, don't ask me, submit new tickets instead. The task will be "done" when the problem is fixed and the text of the puzzle is _removed_ from the source code. Here is more about [PDD](http://www.yegor256.com/2009/03/04/pdd.html) and
[about me](http://www.yegor256.com/2017/04/05/pdd-in-action.html).

body: @amihaiemil[/z](https://www.0crat.com/u/amihaiemil) please, pay attention to this issue

@0pdd[/z](https://www.0crat.com/u/0pdd) this project will fix the problem faster if you donate a few dollars to it; just [click here](https://www.0crat.com/contrib/C9R53K5JA) and pay via Stripe, it's very fast, convenient and appreciated; thanks a lot!
